definitions: The action of selecting or choosing something.
The action of detaching or gathering something, especially fruit or flowers.
The action of plucking the strings of a musical instrument.
The action of provoking or starting a fight or argument.
The action of opening a lock without a key.
examples: She is picking out her favorite dress.
They are picking berries in the field.
He is picking a tune on his guitar.
Stop picking on your little brother.
The thief was picking the lock.
